TextLibrary.Text: Well, Syrus, we've hunted all around Northern Kor for this acquaintance of yours. Could you at least tell me what they look like?
Well, Syrus, we've hunted all around Northern Kor for this acquaintance of yours. Could you at least tell me what they look like?
Well, Syrus, we've hunted all around Northern Kor for this acquaintance of yours. Could you at least tell me what they look like?
Well, Syrus, we've hunted all around Northern Kor for this acquaintance of yours. Could you at least tell me what they look like?
It was important enough to drag us out here looking for them. I'm only trying to help you.
It was important enough to drag us out here looking for them. I'm only trying to help you.
It was important enough to drag us out here looking for them. I'm only trying to help you.
It was important enough to drag us out here looking for them. I'm only trying to help you.
You cannot help me. Nobody can. They are not here anyway. We should return to Dhun-Kor.
